text: Lucão is a Portuguese-language nickname for Lucas and may refer to: *Lucas Alves de Araujo, also known as Lucão, a Brazilian footballer born in 1992 *Lucão (footballer), Lucas Cavalcante Silva Afonso, a Brazilian footballer born in 1996 *Lucas Galdino, commonly known as Lucão, a Brazilian footballer born in 1990 *Lucas Saatkamp, commonly known as Lucão, a Brazilian volleyball player and an Olympic medalist as part of Brazil men's national volleyball team *Lucas Vinicius Gonçalves Silva, commonly known as Lucão, a Brazilian footballer born in 1991 *Lucão (footballer, born 1995), Lucas Marcos Meireles, Brazilian footballer Lucao may refer to the following places: *Lucao, Chiayi, a rural township in Chiayi County, Taiwan *Lucao, a barangay (district) of Dagupan City, Pangasinan, Philippines
title: Lucao
